Tweet: "We need and We will Change this time " was the slogan today by the residents off Kapali Theater area of Gandhinagara.Sewage on streets, robbery and new sense by drug addicts are their common problems. #bjp4gandhinagara @PCMohanMP  @sapthagirigowda @BSYBJP  https://t.co/pyHKCbPsGO
